mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY ( USER_ID, CATEGORY, CONTENT, STATUS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{category}, #{content}, #{status}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id AS inquiryId, i.user_id AS userId, u.username AS username, i.category AS category, i.content AS content, i.status AS status, i.created_at AS createdAt, i.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM INQUIRY i LEFT JOIN USERS u ON i.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY i.created_at DESC
